requiredEquipmentExplanation: The workout video is a floor stretching routine, as explicitly mentioned in the title "10 MIN BEGINNER FLOOR STRETCHES" and reiterated in the description, where it states "All of the stretches will be on the floor today, so grab your mat and get ready to have a comfy stretch!"
